name: The Faith To Follow
description:
A modern retelling of the Greek myth Orpheus and Eurydice as a choose your own adventure game in a fairy tale setting from Eurydice's perspective. 

Evelyn hasn't been killed by a snake, isn't dead in the underworld needing guidance in order to leave. She's just in the fairy world and has to decide if she believes in the man in front of her enough to follow him back to the human world. 

Created in Ink by Inkle.
